titles: Small offers towards the service of the tabernacle in the wilderness four discourses accommodated unto the designs of practical godliness : preached partly at Boston, partly at Charleston / by Cotton Mather ; published by a gentleman lately restored from threatening sickness as a humble essay to serve the interest of religion, in gratitude unto God for his recovery.
author: Mather, Cotton, 1663-1728.
publisher: Printed by R. Pierce, sold by Jos. Brunning,
notes: "The first concerning the methods wherein men ought to engage both themselves and their houses in the service of God, the second concerning the right and best waies of redeeming time in the world, the third concerning the carriage which we should have under trials used by God upon us, the fourth concerning the end which in our desires of life we should propound unto ourselves."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
